articles.content: They are, according to their pal Kenneth Branagh, the greatest quartet of Shakespearean actors on the planet. And on Sunday evening, for the charity get-together For One Knight Only, hosted by Branag… [+3955 chars]

articles.author: Beatrice Loayza
articles.title: Misery at 30: a terrifying look at the toxicity of fandom - The Guardian
articles.description: Rob Reiner’s entertaining adaptation of Stephen King’s darkly funny novel remains horribly effective thanks in large part to a never-better Kathy Bates
articles.content:
Im your number one fan.
Innocent compliment or deranged admission? Thanks to Annie Wilkes, the wild-eyed, romantic potboiler-loving villain of Misery, the expression will always come off a bit creep… [+4396 chars]
